text:
Question 143) An industry has a water reservoir with a capacity of 900 m3. When there is a need to clean the reservoir, all the water needs to be drained. The water flow is done by six drains, and lasts 6 hours when the reservoir is full. This industry will build a new reservoir, with a capacity of 500 m3, whose water flow should be performed within 4 hours when the reservoir is full. The drains used in the new reservoir should be identical to those of the existing one.
The number of drains of the new reservoir should be equal to
A) 2.
B) 4.
C) 5.
D) 8.
E) 9.
